product_name: BOBBI BROWNVitamin Enriched Face Base Moisturizer & Primer with Vitamin C + Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingBobbi Brown's Vitamin Enriched Face Base is a hydrating primer that instantly nourishes, plumps, and preps skin - blending the performance of a makeup primer with the cushion of a moisturizer.
details: DetailsBenefitsA blend of Vitamins B, C and E helps replenish and condition skin with essential nourishment.A moisturizing complex of Hyaluronic Acid, Squalane, and Shea Butter helps instantly hydrate, plump, and prep skin for a fresh, healthy-looking glow.Rich yet lightweight and fast-absorbing primer texture cushions skin and grips foundation for smooth, flawless makeup application.Grapefruit and Geranium leave a light, uplifting scent on skin.Research ResultsFrom consumer testing on 123 women after using product for one week:98% said it left skin looking rejuvenated.96% said it left skin feeling nourished and conditioned.96% said it left skin feeling moisturized throughout the day.96% said it left skin looking healthy.95% said it left skin feeling healthy and infused with moisture.95% said it gripped makeup for flawless application.95% said it layers well with makeup, helping makeup apply smoothly and evenly.93% said if left skin feeling plumped.91% said it improved the look of foundation.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesSulfatesAnimal-Derived IngredientsGlutenItem 2583728How To UseMassage moisturizer primer base onto just-cleansed skin, avoiding eye area. Use with Vitamin Enriched Eye Base to achieve moisturizing prep for undereyes.IngredientsIngredients: Water\Aqua\Eau , Cyclopentasiloxane , Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2 , Butylene Glycol , Ppg-2 Myristyl Ether Propionate , Cetyl Alcohol , Peg-40 Stearate , Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea Butter) , Squalane , Glyceryl Stearate , Sorbitan Stearate , Epilobium Angustifolium Extract , Yeast Extract\Faex\Extrait De Levure , Beta-Carotene , Sodium Hyaluronate , Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil , Tocopheryl Acetate , Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate , Pelargonium Graveolens (Geranium) Flower Oil , Dimethicone Crosspolymer , Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer , Carbomer , Peg-20 Methyl Glucose Sesquistearate , C12-15 Alkyl Ethylhexanoate , Tetrasodium Edta , Sodium Hydroxide , Panthenol , Magnesium Ascorbyl Phosphate , Limonene , Citronellol , Geraniol , Linalool , Chlorphenesin , Phenoxyethanol Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Massage moisturizer primer base onto just-cleansed skin, avoiding eye area. Use with Vitamin Enriched Eye Base to achieve moisturizing prep for undereyes.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: I expect nothing less from BB!
reviews.comments: Great quality and feels good on the skin. I love the ingredients and that it's a moisturizer and primer all in one. Has a slight thickness that you will enjoy and a nice, mild scent. I definitely see what the rave is about and glad I purchased.

reviews.headline: Love this product
reviews.comments: Love how this feels on my skin and it really helps foundation go on a lot smoother.

reviews.headline: nice consistency but too strong of a smell
reviews.comments: if I wanted perfume on my face, I would by a bottle of my favorite a spray it there. instead I want a good moisturizer and primer. I don't mind a soft scent, but this is overpowering.

reviews.headline: Not sure
reviews.comments: Im not sure what is i. This that my skin doesn't like but it didn't work for me.

reviews.headline: The goat
reviews.comments: This is the best primer i've ever tried my makeup and base routine has been saved due to this product!!!

reviews.headline: One step
reviews.comments: I love the way it's both a moisturizer and foundation base.  It goes on smooth never greasy and dries quickly.  It also works well on my sensitive skin.

reviews.headline: I have purchased this product for years
reviews.comments: Great under makeup

reviews.headline: Best Primer!!
reviews.comments: This truly is one of the best primers. I have oily and acne prone skin. Most primers do not work well for me or provide the longevity I need for my makeup to last. When I wear this product my skin feels well taken care of and my makeup lasts. It is pricey, but worth buying around the holidays when you can get two for the price of one!! I belivw this would work well for any skin type. Its not flashy, but its the base everyone needs for their makeup to last!

reviews.headline: Tried so many brands worth the price
reviews.comments: I break out pretty easily and this is my favorite

reviews.headline: Obsessed
reviews.comments: I love lemony scents and i cant stop using this!! It makes my skin feel so soft and refreshed

reviews.headline: Smooth like butter...
reviews.comments: Words cannot express how much I love this primer. I am in my mid-60's and have somewhat dry skin. This is absolutely the best primer I have tried, and I have tried a whole range of them. One tip: use sparingly. You don't need a lot. Put it on top of moisturized skin.

reviews.headline: I will continue to buy this again & again
reviews.comments: Best non greasy but moisturizing primer.

reviews.headline: I've tried em all and THIS IS THE ONE!
reviews.comments:
I am not imagining this! best of a dozen other primers. 
TOTALLY worth it!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: Was not expecting to love this product as much as i have. It is phenomenal! I have sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts when I switch up products so I rarely stray but I am so glad I did! This product is pricey but honestly so so worth it!

reviews.headline: AMAZING
reviews.comments: Was not expecting to love this product as much as i have. It is phenomenal! I have sensitive skin that is prone to breakouts when I switch up products so I rarely stray but I am so glad I did! This product is pricey but honestly so so worth it!

reviews.headline: Love this face base
reviews.comments: This is the creamiest and most luxurious face base. I love it. #bobbibrown I am almost 63 and love this product.

reviews.headline: WORKS WELL
reviews.comments: This works sooo good as a primer ! I will say it had a very strong smell! It smells GOOD but I know it can be overwhelming for some. Still, works amazing! Recommend for sure !!

reviews.headline: Burns a little
reviews.comments: I do have sensitive skin, not super sensitive but I do think this one is a bit harsh for me. Although it is moisturizing I do notice a burning sensation for a few mins after I apply. I'll finish this little amount but likely would not buy again.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I tried countless of face moisturizer/primers this one is by far the greatest one!! I recommend recommended to anyone any skin type!!! I love this product please don't ever stop making it. My makeup comes out flawless.

reviews.headline: The best!
reviews.comments: I tried countless of face moisturizer/primers this one is by far the greatest one!! I recommend recommended to anyone any skin type!!! I love this product please don't ever stop making it. My makeup comes out flawless.

faceoff_positive.comments: If I had to use one thing on my face this would be the it!! It is amazing!! It was thicker than I expected, but it goes on so easily and feels amazing. The smell is fresh! Prior to using this, my face would normally get oily throughtout the day and I always felt like I needed to wash it. I recently switched to BB skincare and am so pleased. After using the Tube Soap Cleanser and the Hydrating Face Tonic, I apply this face base and LOVE how my face feels! My foundation goes on so easily and My face feels great during the day! The price is a little high, but it is worth it!!!! I would buy again and again!!!
faceoff_positive.headline: BEST EVER!!!!!

faceoff_negative.comments: I was so excited to try this, after seeing all of the reviews and claims that it is intended for normal to oily skin.  I have oily skin and this did NOT work for me.  I tried using it with four different foundations; one of which was a mineral powder foundation, ann another being a matte liquid.  It made my skin even more oily and my makeup did not stay in place (even after using a setting spray).  I am so sad that it didn't work for me.  I did recommend this to my sister who has normal to dry skin.  I truly think this product should be marketed to these skin types instead of those with oily skin.  It also clogged my pores but that could also be due to the product making my skin even more oily than normal.  I so wish this worked for me.
faceoff_negative.headline: NOT for my oily skin
